Hi @erinjerri , I believe I have the same issue. Can you share where / how to check for:

  1. Different anaconda install file dlls that should be removed?

  2. How to be sure that I properly removed and reinstalled Numpy

  3. Have all the correct variables added to my path (

  4. Install the correct version of CUDNN? (Is this just replacing the files in the /../cuda/ folder?)

body:
Hi @erinjerri , I believe I have the same issue. Can you share where / how to check for:

1. Different anaconda install file dlls that should be removed?
2. How to be sure that I properly removed and reinstalled Numpy
3. Have all the correct variables added to my path (
![image of my path variables](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5164642/29240391-6ee2de80-7f64-11e7-91a3-98264fbd030d.png)

4. Install the correct version of CUDNN? (Is this just replacing the files in the /../cuda/ folder?)
